Debilitating Smite.name: Debilitating Smite
Debilitating Smite.flavor: So painful is the injury to your enemy that it can barely continue to fight.
Debilitating Smite.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and slowed until the end of your next turn. If the target makes an attack before then, it is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Relentless Justice.name: Relentless Justice
Relentless Justice.flavor: You persevere in your attacks until you make an enemy pay.
Relentless Justice.trigger: You do not hit with a paladin encounter attack power
Relentless Justice.effect: You regain the use of one paladin encounter attack power that you have used during this encounter.
